TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmiConfigurationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WmiConfigurationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WmiConfigurationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: WmiConfiguration 屬性指出某個組件包含使用 WMI.NET 提供者延伸模組模型實作 WMI 提供者的程式碼。

span.span: The WmiConfiguration attribute indicates that an assembly contains code that implements a WMI provider by using the WMI.NET Provider Extensions model.

summary.span: 屬性，接受建立實作的 WMI 提供者之高層級組態的參數。

span.span: The attribute accepts parameters that establish the high-level configuration of the implemented WMI provider.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string scope) cil managed

param.name: scope
param.span: WMI 命名空間，提供者會在此公開類別。

span.span: The WMI namespace in which the provider will expose classes.
For example, "root\MyProviderNamespace".

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以指定 WMI 提供者會在其中公開類別的 WMI 命名空間。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that specifies the WMI namespace in which the WMI provider will expose classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 提供者必須公開其命名空間中的類別。A WMI provider must expose its classes in a namespace. 這就是為什麼建構函式必須做為參數的範圍。That is why the constructor requires scope as a parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HostingGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HostingGroup : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 WMI 提供者的裝載群組。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosting group for the WMI provider.

value.span: 值，表示 WMI 提供者的裝載群組。

span.span: A value that indicates the hosting group for the WMI provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裝載群組只會套用至提供者所裝載同處理序。Hosting groups only apply to providers that are hosted in-process. 低耦合提供者會忽略的值。The value is ignored for decoupled providers. 主控群組是一組都指定相同的主機群組名稱的同處理序提供者。A hosting group is a set of in-process providers that are all assigned the same hosting group name. 主機群組名稱是您定義以邏輯方式群組提供者的字串。The hosting group name is a string that you define to logically group the providers. 所有在相同的主機群組相同的安全性內容下執行同處理序提供者會裝載於 Wmiprvse.exe 程序的單一執行個體。All of the in-process providers in the same hosting group running under the same security context are hosted within a single instance of the Wmiprvse.exe process. 因此，共用相同的主機群組和安全性內容的提供者會共用相同的服務主機處理序。So, providers that share the same hosting group and security context share the same service host process. ## Examples 在下列範例中，用來指出它包含在組件也會裝載任何 Wmiprvse.exe 程序的執行個體中實作 NetworkService 安全性內容下執行，而裝載同處理序提供者其他同處理序中的提供者相同的主機群組，也在 NetworkService 安全性內容中執行。In the following example, the is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements an in-process provider that runs under the NetworkService security context and is hosted in a instance of the Wmiprvse.exe process that also hosts any other in-process providers in the same hosting group that also run within the NetworkService security context. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root\\NVPair", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.NetworkService), HostingGroup = "MyProviders"] ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementHostingModel HostingModel { System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementHostingModel get(); void set(System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementHostingModel value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 WMI 提供者的裝載模型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosting model for the WMI provider.

value.span: 值，表示 WMI 提供者的裝載模型。

span.span: A value that indicates the hosting model of the WMI provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式，或透過 WMI 服務，可裝載 WMI 提供者。WMI providers can be hosted by an application or by the WMI service. 應用程式所裝載的 WMI 提供者稱為低耦合提供者。WMI providers hosted by an application are called decoupled providers. 這些由 WMI 服務會呼叫同處理序提供者。Those hosted by the WMI service are called in-process providers. 裝載模型的值會判斷這兩個裝載模型，在同處理序提供者，提供者所執行的帳戶 （安全性內容） 的情況下。The hosting model value determines both the hosting model and, in the case of in-process providers, the account (security context) under which the provider runs. 如需更多詳細 HostingModel 的可能值的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more detail about the possible values of HostingModel, see . 若要深入了解主控模型，請參閱[提供者裝載和安全性](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100075)MSDN 上的 WMI SDK 中的主題。To learn more about hosting models, see the [Provider Hosting and Security](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100075) topic in the WMI SDK on MSDN. ## Examples 在下列範例中，用來表示它包含在組件實作的提供者，公開透過 root\NVPair 命名空間。In the following example, the is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements a provider that is exposed through the root\NVPair namespace. 因為裝載模型不是，它是同處理序提供者。Because the hosting model is not , it is an in-process provider. 值表示 NetworkService 安全性內容下執行同處理序提供者。The value indicates that the in-process provider runs under the NetworkService security context. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root\\NVPair", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.NetworkService)] ``` 在下一個範例中，用來表示它包含在組件實作的提供者，公開透過 root\NVPair 命名空間。In the next example, the is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements a provider that is exposed through the root\NVPair namespace. 值指出它是低耦合提供者。The value indicates that it is a decoupled provider. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root\\NVPair", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled)] ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IdentifyLevel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IdentifyLevel : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 WMI 提供者是否可模擬其呼叫端。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the WMI provider can impersonate its callers.

summary.span: 如果值為 false，則提供者不能模擬，如果值為 true，提供者就可以模擬。

span.span: If the value is false, the provider cannot impersonate, and if the value is true, the provider can impersonate.

value.span: 布林值，指出提供者是否可以模擬其呼叫端。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a provider can or cannot impersonate its callers.

value.span: 如果值為 false，則提供者不能模擬，如果值為 true，提供者就可以模擬。

span.span: If the value is false, the provider cannot impersonate, and if the value is true, the provider can impersonate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱在線上 MSDN library 中的 「 提供者主控和安全性 > 主題[ http://www.msdn.com ](https://www.msdn.com/)。For more information, see the "Provider Hosting and Security" topic in the MSDN library online at [http://www.msdn.com](https://www.msdn.com/). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 IdentifyLevel 參數來指出提供者可以模擬其呼叫端。The following example demonstrates how to use the IdentifyLevel parameter to indicate that the provider can impersonate its callers. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root/MyProv", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled, IdentifyLevel = true] ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NamespaceSecurity { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NamespaceSecurity : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) 字串，指定命名空間上的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)，提供者在此命名空間中公開管理物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string that specifies the security descriptor on the namespace in which the provider exposes management objects.

value.span: SDDL 字串，表示命名空間上的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)，提供者會在此命名空間中公開管理物件。

span.span: An SDDL string that represents the security descriptor on the namespace in which the provider exposes management objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何代表安全性描述元以 SDDL 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性描述元字串格式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100763)線上 MSDN library 中的主題。For more information about how to represent security descriptors in SDDL format, see the [Security Descriptor String Format](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100763) topic in the MSDN library online. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用命名空間安全性參數來實作這個組件中的提供者會公開 WMI 類別的根/SDTest 命名空間上設定的安全性描述元。The following example demonstrates how to use the NamespaceSecurity parameter to set the security descriptor on the root/SDTest namespace in which the provider implemented in this assembly exposes WMI classes. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root/SDTest", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled, IdentifyLevel = false, NamespaceSecurity = "O:BAG:BAD:(A;CI;0x60003;;;WD)")] ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As String
public: property System::String ^ Scope { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 WMI 命名空間，WMI 提供者會在此命名空間中公開類別。

span.span: Gets or sets the WMI namespace in which the WMI provider exposes classes.

value.span: 值，表示 WMI 提供者在其中公開類別的命名空間。

span.span: A value that indicates the namespace in which the WMI provider exposes classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 命名空間是 WMI 存放庫內的分類。A WMI namespace is a category within the WMI repository. 常用 root/cimv2 命名空間包含描述通用訊息模型，第 2 版 Desktop Management Task Force (DMTF) 協會所定義的類別。The commonly-used root/cimv2 namespace houses classes that describe the Common Information Model, Version 2, defined by the Desktop Management Task Force (DMTF) consortium. 您只應該公開您的提供者，該命名空間中，如果您只 CIM 模型時展開。You should only expose your providers in that namespace if you expanding upon the standand CIM model. 否則，您應該建立適當的命名空間，讓使用者他們可以預期的命名空間中尋找的 WMI 類別的型別。Otherwise, you should create an appropriate namespace that makes clear to users the type of WMI classes they can expect to find in the namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SecurityRestriction { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 WMI 提供者的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)。

span.span: Gets or sets a security descriptor for the WMI provider.

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Online Library ([http://www.msdn.com](https://www.msdn.com/))＜__Win32Provider＞主題中，有關 SecurityDescriptor 屬性的資訊。

span.span: For more information, see the SecurityDescriptor property information in the "__Win32Provider" topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](https://www.msdn.com/).

value.span: 值，其中包含 WMI 提供者的安全性描述元。

span.span: A value that contains the security descriptor for the WMI provider.
